title: Child receives minor injuries due to an accidental discharge of a weapon.
content:
At 12:15 PM on Saturday, December 12, 2015, Anchorage Police responded to a home on the 4000 block of Wispen Circle regarding an accidental discharge of a handgun. As a result of the discharge, a 3-year-old child was transported to the hospital with a non-life-threatening injury to a finger.
There was a parent present in the home at the time. No charges have been filed as of yet and the investigation is ongoing.
APD Case 15-50294
